annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I’m going to be showing you how to make the best brunch cocktail on earth, the Gordon’s Breakfast. This is a Gin and Cucumbe...
annotations.title: Gordon's Cup | How to Drink

textContent:
8 Lime Wedges
4 Cucumber Wheels
.75oz Simple syrup
2oz London Dry Gin

Shake and pour
Garnish with cucumbers and limes
Sprinkle with Kosher salt and pepper

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3T9rWiXXKs4
title: Gordon's Cup
